description:
The AirPods 4 have received near-universal praise; however, I’m *not* as convinced…
Shop ESR Cyber FlickLock™ Case (HaloLock): https://amzn.to/4gupReV
Shop ESR Orbit Hybrid Case (HaloLock): https://amzn.to/47uBj6l

Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter - http://twitter.com/snazzyq
Follow me on Instagram - http://instagram.com/snazzyq

In this review, we take a deep dive into the Apple AirPods 4, exploring both the $180 Active Noise Cancellation model and the standard $130 version. We discuss improvements in fitment, sound quality, and the new adaptive audio features, but also address some overlooked shortcomings like the lack of a skin sensor and volume controls. We also compare the AirPods 4 to the previous AirPods 3 and AirPods Pro 2, evaluating everything from ANC performance to microphone quality. Tune in for a full breakdown of whether these upgrades justify the price.

0:00 Everybody else loves AirPods 4
0:43 $130 vs $180 AirPods 4
1:48 The case size is tiny and buttonless
3:19 Speaker
title: AirPods 4 OVERHYPED! An Audiophile’s Perspective…
